front.title: Reclassification of COPS-PR and SPPI to Historic

abstract.t: This memo requests the reclassification of RFC 3084, COPS Usage for Policy Provisioning, RFC 3159, Structure of Policy Provisioning Information, RFC 3317, Differentiated Services Quality of Service Policy Information Base, RFC 3318, Framework Policy Information Base, and RFC 3571, Framework Policy Information Base for Usage, Feedback, to Historic status.
